ai-tha-ap185:1.4_0: as it really is for a conflict.
ai-tha-ap185:2.2_0: like a flame in the wind.
ai-tha-ap185:2.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap185:2.4_0: I came to the supreme city.
ai-tha-ap185:3.3_0: I rejoice in the Buddha’s instruction.
ai-tha-ap185:4.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap185:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap185:5.1_0: I’m twenty years old, twenty, thirty,
ai-tha-ap185:5.2_0: Wealth in the teaching of the great lady—
ai-tha-ap185:5.3_0: I alone had a great sacrifice,
ai-tha-ap185:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Koḷivisa.
ai-tha-ap185:8.1_0: The third (monks) of Kosiyan, for the third time,
